DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability escalate dos MM-121 plus cetuximab MM-121 plus cetuximab plus irinotecan combination .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study MM-121 With Cetuximab Irinotecan Patients With Advanced Cancers
DOC.detailed_description: This study Phase 1 pharmacologic dose-escalation trial MM-121 plus cetuximab plus irinotecan . The study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics MM-121 , cetuximab irinotecan .
DOC.criteria: No standard option remain Adequate liver kidney function 18 year age History secondary active cancer last 3 year . Pregnant breast feed History severe allergic reaction contraindication cetuximab irinotecan
